programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A disgruntled man snaps and goes on a killing spree, terrorizing the entire borough of Brooklyn, New York. Cops track the killer's trail of victims for more than 24 hours before they finally hunt him down across the city.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Four young adults are gunned down inside an affluent home in a suburb of Houston, Texas. Police investigate the quadruple homicide for three years, chasing down hundreds of leads, before arriving at a cold-blooded killer with a convoluted motive.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: After months of investigation, cops make two discoveries that confirm an expectant mom who disappeared on Christmas Eve had been targeted for murder.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A bloodbath inside a Beverly Hills mansion sparks a high publicized investigation; after months working the case, law enforcement uncovers the secrets of a family so deep in turmoil that a cold-blooded murder plot was hatched to bring it down.

programme.title: Xploration Animal Science
programme.desc: Creatures of North America: the Canada goose; the beaver.

programme.title: Xploration: Animal Science
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of Europe. Find out why the Mongoose is immune to cobra venom. And why 80% of the Dragonfly's brain is used to process what it sees.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Grand Canyon; an ancient cave on the island of Curacao; Lake Michigan; ice ages.

programme.title: Xploration: Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau travels to Curacao and dives along the coral reefs to capture lionfish, an invasive species that's destroying the sea life in these waters. We visit the Chesapeake Bay to see what's being done to restore the oyster population.

programme.title: Photowalks On Scripps News
programme.desc: oin Jefferson Graham on a photowalk through Heber and Park City, UT, with some of his favorite photo spots and tips to use your smartphone to capture your own perfect pictures.

programme.title: Photowalks On Scripps News
programme.desc: Join Jefferson Graham on a photowalk through Cleveland, which he says has one of the best urban skylines he's seen in a while. Learn how to use your smartphone to capture your own perfect pictures.

programme.title: Bright Now
programme.desc: High-tech tools are being used to evaluate youth baseball players. The question is can they outperform professional scouts?

programme.title: Bright Now!
programme.desc: Examining whether blockchain technology is safe as it sweeps the globe, moving from high-flying cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin to more traditional sectors of the economy.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: The Greenland ice sheet, the last remnant of the Ice Age, is melting at an unprecedented rate. Today, scientists and researchers from all over the world are paying close attention to what could become a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Within a few decades many bacteria our bodies depend on will have disappeared, so scientists are racing to create a vault for Human Microbiota like a Noah's Ark for the future of the human species.

programme.title: Caught On... Clips
programme.desc: The wildest, wackiest, and most jaw-dropping videos. From dangerous severe weather, to heart-stopping close calls and adorable animal antics - all caught on camera.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Kentucky a husband's marriage is threatened by the wild parties thrown on his luxury boat; a mistress plots to eliminate her romantic rival in England.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Missouri, a preacher falling for a parishioner has deadly consequences; a washing line provides clues as to what happened to a troubled wife in Canada.

programme.title: Deep Undercover
programme.sub-title: Operation Nevada Volunteers: Sin City Bomber
programme.desc: ATF agent Jay Dobyns infiltrates the ranks of the Nevada Volunteers, plotting to overthrow the government and intending to blow up the Vegas strip.

programme.title: Deep Undercover
programme.desc: Memphis Police officer Anthony Godwin goes undercover in the seedy adult nightclub scene to break up organized crime involving drugs and prostitution; Anthony loses himself and contemplates suicide before he's pulled back from the brink.

programme.title: Deep Undercover
programme.desc: FBI agent infiltrates the mob that controls gambling and drugs in New England; NJ deputy opens an illegal betting club to snare local wise guys; Missouri Highway Patrol enters the world of dogfighting to break its back and save the animals.
